text: - [Presenter] UKTV is part of BBC Studios,
a commercial subsidiary

of the world's leading public
service broadcaster, the BBC.

In the United Kingdom, UKTV
has been at the forefront

of commercial television
for three decades,

captivating millions with
entertainment designed
for every viewer.
And with the help of an AWS solution,

this broadcaster has elevated
their media supply chain
to the next level.
- At UKTV, we try and create content
for a modern viewer

and we publish our content
across multiple genres.

So entertainment, factual,
natural history, and drama.

But we don't just deliver
for linear channels.
We deliver for our VOD platforms.

For us, that's things
like UKTV Play and AVOD.
We are highly ambitious

about getting our technology
solutions correct.
- [Antony] We schedule that content.
We commission that content.
The part that we are involved with,

it's the processing of
that content to get it out

and to be able to be
viewed by our audiences.

Can it ensure that it's good
from a regulatory perspective,

we kind of limited to have
to work with the vendor

that we are using for
everything that we wanted
and that's not a good place to be.
- UKTV were having issues
with the scalability of their platform
that they were currently running.
Whenever they needed to run more content
through that platform
they had to consult the third party,
which was not ideal.

They found that whenever
they were generally running

three or 400% of their
allocated storage quota
and they were paying a significant premium
with that third party provider
- [Presenter] UKTV realized it needed
a cost effective turnkey solution

that would allow full
control over its content
at every phase of the supply chain.
But a media solution
is only as good as its ability
to ingest and process assets at scale.
They adopted the AWS solution Media2Cloud.
- We wanted something
that fit with our current architecture.

So we were looking for a
mostly serverless architecture.

We wanted to minimize
the amount of maintenance

that we had around
looking after the systems
that we were going to run.

We didn't want to have
to be managing servers
and doing updates,
and those sorts of maintenance activities.

- [Presenter] Media2Cloud
from the AWS solutions library
is a ready to deploy solution
that provides users with a foundation
for ingesting and processing assets,

as an easy plugin to their
overall media workflow.
- Because of the nature of the solution,
we can just essentially, within reason

give it as as many jobs
as we want simultaneously
and it scales up and it copes with them.
And that's what we found
when we took our content into Media2Cloud

we were able to compress
that several months period

that we'd experience
prior, into three weeks.
- We are committed to cost savings
and other benefits for the business.
But something that is really important
for the whole company is sustainability.
And it's fantastic that AWS is helping us

reach our Net Zero
commitments in this area.

- Media2Cloud is an event
driven architecture.
What does that mean?
So that is when no work is being done
there is no compute being used.

So in that sense, you're
not paying for it,
and it's not producing any carbon.
That aligns with the UKTV's goals
of being Net Zero by 2030.

- [Presenter] Beyond
sustainability and cost savings,
Media2Cloud turns archives like UKTVs
into a treasure trove of data.
- After you run the analysis workflow,

then what it does is
that it actually create
a layer of the machine learning's metadata
that attach with your video file itself.
Whether that you will be able to find
or search a specific phrase
or celebrity within the videos.
And all these kind of informations

can extract by the
machine learnings models
by running the analysis workflow itself.

So it helps you to enrich the
values of the video archive

and also allow you to
have the searchability

of knowing what exactly
it's within those videos
that you normally would not get.

- [Marcus] We try and
create TV with personality,
and having more and rich metadata
allows our schedulers to curate and create

much better TV experiences
for our viewers.
We're powered by innovative ideas at UKTV
not blockbuster budgets.
And the Media2Cloud AWS solution
is true to our mission,

to use technology in even
more innovative ways.
(bright music)
